bs-tagcloud-desc: Description of the BlueSpiceTagCloud extension used in Extension credits.
bs-tagcloud-error-tagtype:
Error message that the given 'store' parameter is not a valid store.
*$1 is the given store
bs-tagcloud-error-tagrenderer:
Error message that the given 'renderer' parameter is not a valid renderer.
*$1 is the given renderer
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-name: Name of the tagcloud tag, used in various contexts
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-title: Title for the tagcloud tag VisualEditor inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-desc: Description of the tagcloud tag shown in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-renderer-h: Help message for the "renderer" attribute input field  in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-renderer-o:
Label for the option "text" of the "renderer" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
{{Identical|Text}}
Label for the option "list" of the "renderer" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
Label for the option "canvas3d" of the "renderer" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-store-labe: Label of the "store" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-store-help: Help message for the "store" attribute input field  in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-store-opti:
Label for the option "categories" of the "store" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
{{Identical|Category}}
Label for the option "searchstats" of the "store" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-width-labe:
Label of the "width" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
{{Identical|Width}}
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-width-help: Help message for the "width" attribute input field  in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-minsize-la: Label of the "minsize" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-minsize-he: Help message for the "minsize" attribute input field  in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-maxsize-la: Label of the "maxsize" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-maxsize-he: Help message for the "maxsize" attribute input field  in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-exclude-la: Label of the "exclude" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-exclude-he: Help message for the "exclude" attribute input field  in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-tagcloud-droplet-name: Title of droplet for tag TagCloud
bs-tagcloud-droplet-description: Description of droplet for tag TagCloud
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-tab-common: Label for the VE inspector tab
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-tab-advanced: Label for the VE inspector tab
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-renderer-d: Label for dropdown field to select view mode
